summary: Adds seven amulets to your game's leveled lists that reduce the cooldown time of your shouts by varying degrees.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]Introduction:[/b][/u]
I made this mod for a friend of mine. He asked me if I could make a mod where you have amulets that reduce shout duration more than that of the Amulet of Talos. So I did but I figured I may as well share them here in case others wanted them too.

[u][b]Contents:

[/b][/u][list][*]Amulet of Petty Shouting: 10% shout cooldown reduction (level 5+)[/*]
[*]Amulet of Minor Shouting: 20% shout cooldown reduction (level 10+)[/*]
[*]Amulet of Lesser Shouting: 30% shout cooldown reduction (level 15+)[/*]
[*]Amulet of Moderate Shouting: 40% shout cooldown reduction (level 20+)[/*]
[*]Amulet of Greater Shouting: 50% shout cooldown reduction (level 25+)[/*]
[*]Amulet of Major Shouting: 60% shout cooldown reduction (level 30+)[/*]
[*]Amulet of Grand Shouting: 70% shout cooldown reduction (level 35+)[/*]
[/list]
I did not place all of these necklaces in a single chest someplace. I instead added all of these to the leveled lists of the games. Meaning you will receive them from enemy/ treasure drops as you play. They are also leveled, meaning you won't get the 70% reduction amulet at level 5. This is to hopefully avoid unbalancing things somewhat.
Anyways, enjoy!
author: Altrunchen
